description:
Ramone`s Stoutland participated in the Pok√©mon World Tournament Junior Cup at the Kagome Town stadium. In the first round it was in the seventh match and faced off against Dawn`s Piplup. The match quickly showcased Dawn`s Piplup finishing off Ramone`s Stoutland to win the battle which allowed Dawn to advance to the second round while Ramone was eliminated from the tournament.
None of Ramone`s Stoutland moves are known.
name: Mooland (Rikioh)
